TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Calendar extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 代表可讓使用者使用視覺行事曆顯示選取日期的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control that enables a user to select a date by using a visual calendar display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項可以使用其本身，或做為下拉式清單一部分控制項。A control can be used on its own, or as a drop-down part of a control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . > [!NOTE] > 支援西曆日曆。The supports only the Gregorian calendar. 下表提供工作通常與相關聯的相關資訊。The following table provides information about tasks that are typically associated with the . |工作Task|實作Implementation| |----------|--------------------| |具有顯示每個月、 年或十年以上。Have the display a month, an entire year, or a decade.|設定月份、 年份或十的屬性。Set the property to Month, Year, or Decade.| |指定使用者是否可以選取日期的日期範圍或多個範圍的日期。Specify whether the user can select a date, a range of dates, or multiple ranges of dates.|使用。Use the .| |指定的日期無法選取。Specify dates that cannot be selected.|請使用 屬性。Use the property.| |指定的日期範圍，顯示。Specify the range of dates that the displays.|使用和屬性。Use the and properties.| |指定目前的日期會反白顯示。Specify whether the current date is highlighted.|請使用 屬性。Use the property. 根據預設，是`true`。By default, is `true`.| |變更大小。Change the size of the .|使用或設定屬性。Use a or set the property to a . 請注意，如果您設定和屬性，實際的行事曆不會變更其大小。Note that if you set the and properties of a , the actual calendar does not change its size.| 控制項提供使用滑鼠或鍵盤的基本巡覽。The control provides basic navigation using either the mouse or keyboard. 下表摘要說明的鍵盤巡覽。The following table summarizes keyboard navigation. |按鍵組合Key Combination||動作Action| |---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------| |箭號ARROW||變更屬性如果屬性未設定為。Changes the property if the property is not set to .| |箭號ARROW||變更的月份屬性。Changes the month of the property. 請注意，不會變更。Note that the does not change.| |箭號ARROW||變更的年份。Changes the year of the . 請注意，不會變更。Note that the does not change.| |SHIFT + 方向鍵SHIFT+ARROW||如果未設定為或，擴充選取的日期範圍。If is not set to or , extends the range of selected dates.| |首頁HOME||變更目前月份的第一天。Changes the to the first day of the current month.| |首頁HOME||變更的月份來年的第一個月。Changes the month of the to the first month of the year. 不會變更。The does not change.| |首頁HOME||變更的年份至十年的第一年。Changes the year of the to the first year of the decade. 不會變更。The does not change.| |ENDEND||變更當月最後一天。Changes the to the last day of the current month.| |ENDEND||變更的月份年度的上個月。Changes the month of the to the last month of the year. 不會變更。The does not change.| |ENDEND||變更的年份至十年的最後一年。Changes the year of the to the last year of the decade. 不會變更。The does not change.| |CTRL+向上鍵CTRL+UP ARROW|任何Any|切換至下一個較大。Switches to the next larger . 如果已經，採取任何動作。If is already , no action.| |CTRL+向下鍵CTRL+DOWN ARROW|任何Any|切換至下一個較小。Switches to the next smaller . 如果已經，採取任何動作。If is already , no action.| |空白鍵或 ENTERSPACEBAR or ENTER| 或 or |交換器至或焦點的項目所表示。Switches to the or represented by focused item.| ## 自訂行事曆控制項Customizing the Calendar Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[行事曆樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Calendar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/calendar-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下圖顯示兩個控制項，一個具有項目，並停止日期，另一個則沒有。The following illustration shows two controls, one with selections and blackout dates and one without. ![月曆控制項](~/add/media/ndp-calendarcontrols.png "月曆控制項")![Calendar controls](~/add/media/ndp-calendarcontrols.png "Calendar controls") Calendar 控制項Calendar controls 下列程式碼和 XAML 建立的頁面，具有兩個類似於上一個圖例中的控制項。The following code and XAML creates a page with two controls that is similar to the previous illustration. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BlackoutDates As CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection

summary.span: 取得標記為無法選取的日期集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of dates that are marked as not selectable.
A collection of dates that cannot be selected.
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此集合中的日期會出現灰色和交錯出行事曆。Dates in this collection will appear gray and crossed out on the calendar. 若要讓所有過去的日期不能選取，您可以使用這個屬性所傳回的集合所提供的方法。To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the method provided by the collection returned by this property. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges**oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges* 一或多個物件項目類型的。One or more object elements of type . ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有某些不能選取的日期。The following example creates a that has some dates that cannot be selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![無法選取的日期的行事曆。](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "行事曆日期無法選取。")![Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.") 無法選取的日期的行事曆Calendar with dates that cannot be selected

MemberSignature.Value: public: property DateTime DisplayDate { DateTime get(); void set(DateTime value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the date to display.
The date to display.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性會指定行事曆的顯示和何者得到焦點內行事曆。The and properties specify what the calendar displays and what has focus within the calendar. 使用者可以變更時，才設為 Month，但使用者可能會變更行事曆處於年份和十年的模式。The user can change the only when is set to Month, but the user might change the when the Calendar is in Year and Decade mode. 下表描述如何變更模式。The following table describes how the mode changes the . |DisplayModeDisplayMode|動作Action| |-----------------|------------| |月份Month| 當使用者導覽至不同的月份的變更。 changes when the user navigates to a different month.| |YearYear|月份的變更當使用者按一下或巡覽至不同的月份。The month of changes when the user clicks or navigates to a different month.| |十年Decade|中的年份變更當使用者按一下或巡覽至其他年份。The year of changes when the user clicks or navigates to another year.| 如果其值已超出所指定的日期範圍就會忽略和屬性。 is ignored if its value is outside of the range of dates that is specified by and properties. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼會設定與特定範圍可顯示的日期，以及集合目前所選取及顯示日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)]

value.span: 行事曆中可用的最後一個日期。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以限制的範圍藉由設定和屬性。You can restrict the range of a by setting the and properties. 使用者無法捲動到，或選取日期超出此範圍。A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range. 如果您設定屬性後至今，設定相同的值為。If you set the property to a date that is after , is set to the same value as . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼會設定與特定範圍可顯示的日期，以及集合目前所選取及顯示日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. span.span: Gets or sets the first date that is available in the calendar.

span.span: The first date that is available in the calendar.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由設定限制的行事曆範圍和屬性。You can restrict the range of a Calendar by setting the and properties. 使用者無法捲動到，或選取日期超出此範圍。A user cannot scroll to or select dates outside of this range. 如果您設定為之前的日期屬性，設定相同的值為。If you set the property to a date that is before , is set to the same value as . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列程式碼會設定與特定範圍可顯示的日期，以及集合目前所選取及顯示日期。The following code sets up a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::CalendarMode DisplayMode { System::Windows::Controls::CalendarMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::CalendarMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示行事曆會顯示一個月、一年還是十年。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the calendar displays a month, year, or decade.

value.span: 一個值，表示 應該顯示的時間長度。

span.span: A value that indicates what length of time the should display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個月、 年或十年以上，就可以顯示行事曆。A Calendar can display a month, a year, or a decade. 下表列出使用者巡覽至每個模式的方式。The following table lists how the user navigates to each mode. |DisplayModeDisplayMode|動作Action| |-----------------|------------| |月份Month|若要瀏覽至年模式，按一下月份標題。To navigate to Year mode, click the month heading.| |YearYear|若要瀏覽至十年模式，按一下年份標題。To navigate to Decade mode, click the year heading. 若要巡覽至月份模式，按一下其中一個顯示的月份。To navigate to Month mode, click one of the displayed months.| |十年Decade|若要巡覽至年模式，按一下其中一個顯示的年份。To navigate to Year mode, click one of the displayed years.| ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## Examples 下列範例會建立在一年和控制代碼會顯示月份行事曆事件，以便當使用者按一下一個月或年，行事曆不會變更其。The following example creates a calendar that displays the months in a year and handles the event so that when the user clicks on a month or the year, the calendar does not change its . [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#4)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#4](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#4)] [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: The data for the event.

summary.span: 提供 路由事件的類別處理，當這個控制項取得焦點時使用者按下按鍵便會發生。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key while this control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，以支援鍵盤巡覽。 overrides the method to support keyboard navigation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 此實作會將標示事件，如藉由設定處理屬性的事件資料至`true`按鍵動作，例如按下方向鍵，當執行瀏覽動作。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when a keystroke, such as pressing an ARROW key, performs a navigation action.

para.span: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作您實作。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 無法呼叫基底實作可防止基底類別處理事件的類別處理常式，可能會變更的最終類別的執行階段行為。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyUp (e As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user releases a key while this control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法，以支援鍵盤巡覽。 overrides the method to support keyboard navigation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。This implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作您實作。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 無法呼叫基底實作可防止基底類別處理事件的類別處理常式，可能會變更的最終類別的執行階段行為。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

public: property Nullable<DateTime> SelectedDate { Nullable<DateTime> get(); void set(Nullable<DateTime> value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前選取的日期。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently selected date.
The date currently selected.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| 使用這個屬性時設。Use this property when is set to . 在其他模式中，這個屬性一定會是中的第一個日期。In other modes, this property will always be the first date in . ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *dateTimeString**dateTimeString* 日期，這是其中一種格式中所列[DateTime XAML 語法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md)主題。A date that is in one of the formats that are listed in the [DateTime XAML Syntax](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/datetime-xaml-syntax.md) topic. ## Examples 下列範例會建立與特定範圍可顯示的日期，以及集合目前所選取及顯示日期。The following example creates a with a particular range of displayable dates, and sets the currently selected and displayed date. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#2)]

exception.span: 指定的日期不在 和 所指定的範圍內

span.span: The specified date is outside the range specified by and
-or-

exception.span: 指定的日期會在 集合中。

span.span: The specified date is in the collection.

exception.span: 如果在 設定為 時，設為 以外的任何項目。

span.span: If set to anything other than when is set to .

Public Shared ReadOnly SelectedDateProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedDates As SelectedDatesCollection

summary.span: 取得選定日期的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of selected dates.

value.span: 包含目前選取之日期的 物件。

span.span: A object that contains the currently selected dates.
The default is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日期可以加入至集合，個別或在範圍中使用方法。Dates can be added to the collection either individually or in a range using the method. 值而定屬性，將加入集合的日期或範圍可能會導致它被清除。Depending on the value of the property, adding a date or range to the collection may cause it to be cleared. 下表列出如何影響屬性。The following table lists how affects the property. |CalendarSelectionModeCalendarSelectionMode|描述Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| ||不允許選取。No selections are allowed. 無法設定並沒有值可加入至。 cannot be set and no values can be added to .| ||單一日期可以選擇，請設定中的第一個值或。Only a single date can be selected, either by setting or the first value in . 無法使用。 cannot be used.| ||可以選取單一的日期範圍。A single range of dates can be selected. 設定，分別為附加日期，或使用將會清除所有先前的值從。Setting , adding a date individually to , or using will clear all previous values from .| ||可以選取多個不連續的日期範圍。Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected. 為個別加入日期或使用將不會清除。Adding a date individually to or using will not clear . 設定仍將會清除，但可新增其他的日期或範圍。Setting will still clear , but additional dates or ranges can then be added. 加入包含某些日期尚未選取，或是與另一個範圍會聯集中的範圍重疊，不會造成例外狀況的範圍。Adding a range that includes some dates that are already selected or overlaps with another range results in the union of the ranges and does not cause an exception.| ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects**oneOrMoreDateTimeObjects* 一或多個物件項目。One or more object elements. ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有多個所選取日期範圍。The following example creates a that has multiple ranges of dates selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)]

span.span: A value that indicates the current selection mode.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|無None| 此屬性會決定是否可讓沒有選取項目、 選取範圍的單一日期或選取的多個日期。This property determines whether the allows no selection, selection of a single date, or selection of multiple dates. 指定選取模式列舉型別。The selection mode is specified with the enumeration. 這個屬性變更時，將會清除所有選取的日期。When this property is changed, all selected dates will be cleared. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \\ ## Examples 下列範例會建立具有多個所選取日期範圍。The following example creates a that has multiple ranges of dates selected. [!code-csharp[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[CalendarSnippets#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/calendarsnippets/xaml/window1.xaml#3)]
